document.heading: Low-Income Housing Tax Credit Fund Temporary Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-230, the “Low-Income Housing Tax Credit Fund Temporary Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-927, and was retained by the Council. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 13, 2004, and October 5, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 1, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-570 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-230 became effective on March 16, 2005.
